pageContext.claim: “[Northam] wants to totally -- and all he does is talk about terminating the Second Amendment, that's all he talks about. That's all he talks about.”
pageContext.analysis: A gross exaggeration. Virginia for the first time in many years has a Democratic legislature and governor. Lawmakers are considering gun-control measures that would require background checks for people purchasing firearms and give municipalities the authority to ban weapons in public buildings, as many other states do. Guns would not be taken away, as Trump says. Moreover, the governor of any state cannot overturn a constitutional amendment.
